amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the third paragraph of title IV. In its entirety, title IV provides funds for Overseas Contingency Operations of the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the pending paragraph pertaining to the Military Construction, Defense-Wide.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 231, 1 Present (Roll no. 186).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 190 - 231, 1 Present (Roll no. 186).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
